## Download

```{ojs}
JSZip = require('https://unpkg.com/jszip@3.1.5/dist/jszip.min.js')
zip = {
  const zip = new JSZip()
  const folder = zip.folder('pdfs')
  //folder.file('data.txt', data)
  return zip.generateAsync({type: 'blob'})
}
```

```{ojs}
DOM.download(zip, 'pdfs.zip')
```
